mapper.insert: insert into undo_log (branch_id, xid, log_status, log_created, log_modified, ext, rollback_info) values (#{branchId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{xid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{logModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rollbackInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})
mapper.update: update undo_log set branch_id = #{branchId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, xid = #{xid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, log_status = #{logStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, log_created = #{logCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, log_modified = #{logModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ext = #{ext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rollback_info = #{rollbackInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, branch_id, xid, log_status, log_created, log_modified, ext, rollback_info from undo_log
